backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing appointment management with functions to book, retrieve all, cancel, and search appointments by service type using a Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of accordion-style service cards with detailed Hindi content for dental services including check-ups, RCT, and implants.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components including routing, layout, pages, and hooks with descriptions of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for a healthcare-themed design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with home and booking routes, QueryClient provider, and toast notifications.
Appointment booking form with validation, service selection, date/time inputs, backend mutation integration, and success state display with Hindi labels.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying embedded Google Maps, clinic hours, phone number, and WhatsApp button with backdrop-blurred cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with clinic branding, contact information, quick links, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component with logo, phone number, and navigation to home and booking pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with Hindi/Hinglish headline, CTA buttons, stats (10+ years, 5000+ patients, 24/7 care), and a two-column image grid with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Header, Footer, and nested routes via Outlet from TanStack Router.
Accordion-based services section displaying six dental services (check-up, RCT, implants, whitening, braces, pediatric) with icons, descriptions, and booking CTAs in Hindi/Hinglish.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Testimonials section displaying three patient reviews with avatars, 5-star ratings, and Hindi text, plus a 4.9/5 Google rating badge.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Four-card grid showcasing clinic features (expert doctors, modern tech, emergency care, affordable pricing) with icons and Hindi/Hinglish descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor, handling authenticated/anonymous states and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all appointments and searching appointments by service type using the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom healthcare teal color scheme for light/dark modes, CSS variables for theming, and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Booking page component that displays an appointment form with a back button navigation and Hindi/Hinglish text for local accessibility.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component that composes the main landing page from HeroSection, ServicesSection, WhyChooseUsSection, TestimonialsSection, and ContactSection components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom fonts (Inter), and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking a dental hospital website with features including hero section, services display, testimonials, contact integration, and online appointment booking system with Hindi/Hinglish language support.
